name: Pleistopia
description:
In Pleistopia, you will play as a soldier from an unknown faction, known under the codename of Bobcat. Wield your time-travelling tank (T3) through the snowy plains of the Ice Age, battle antitank-turrets, enemy T3s or mammoths, and counter the evil plan of Prof. Shirô! Will you save the humankind from an unspeakable fate?

Controls: this game can only be played using keyboard and mouse. Use directional arrows and/or ZQSD to move, target enemies with the mouse pointer, and shoot with the mouse left click
